select *,date(create_time)date from source_report where create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
and type =#{type}

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.inAccrual),0) from ${assistDataBase}.agent a right join ( SELECT id from ${assistDataBase}.organization where org_type in (4,5) and status=1 and del_status!=-1 )b on a.org_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( select agent_org_id,sum(accrual)inAccrual from ${assistDataBase}.finance_account_log WHERE create_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and pay_type=1 and account_type != 1 GROUP BY agent_org_id )c on c.agent_org_id=a.id where a.del_status != -1

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.outAccrual),0) from ${assistDataBase}.agent a right join ( SELECT id from ${assistDataBase}.organization where org_type in (4,5) and status=1 and del_status!=-1 )b on a.org_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( select agent_org_id,sum(accrual)outAccrual from ${assistDataBase}.finance_account_log WHERE create_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and pay_type in (-9,-112) and account_type != 1 GROUP BY agent_org_id )c on c.agent_org_id=a.id where a.del_status != -1

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.useable + c.frozen + c.out_frozen + 0.8*c.cargo_interest+c.cargo_interest_puchas),0)manageFund from ${assistDataBase}.agent a left join ( SELECT agent_id,follow_id from follow_agent )b on a.id = b.agent_id left join ${assistDataBase}.finance_account c on c.id =a.account_id where a.del_status != -1 and a.org_id is NULL and b.follow_id is NULL

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.inAccrual),0) from ${assistDataBase}.agent a left join ( SELECT agent_id,follow_id from follow_agent )b on a.id = b.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( select agent_org_id,sum(accrual)inAccrual from ${assistDataBase}.finance_account_log WHERE create_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and pay_type=1 and account_type != 1 GROUP BY agent_org_id )c on c.agent_org_id=a.id where a.del_status != -1 and a.org_id is NULL and b.follow_id is NULL

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.outAccrual),0) from ${assistDataBase}.agent a left join ( SELECT agent_id,follow_id from follow_agent )b on a.id = b.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( select agent_org_id,sum(accrual)outAccrual from ${assistDataBase}.finance_account_log WHERE create_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and pay_type in (-9,-112) and account_type != 1 GROUP BY agent_org_id )c on c.agent_org_id=a.id where a.del_status != -1 and a.org_id is NULL and b.follow_id is NULL
SELECT ifnull(sum(manage_fund),0)manageFund from follow_up_log a where create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
SELECT ifnull(sum(in_cash),0)inCash from follow_up_log a where create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
SELECT ifnull(sum(out_cash),0)outCash from follow_up_log a where create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
